text: Fantastic gaming laptop for the price. Getting amazing FPS in Elden Ring and Fortnite. The build quality of the HP Pavilion 15-cx0056wm 15.6" IPS Intel Core i5 8th Gen 8300H (2.30 GHz) NVIDIA GeForce GTX 1050 Ti 8 GB Memory 1 TB HDD Windows 10 Home 64-bit Gaming Laptop is solid, and the speakers is a joy to use. A definite 5 stars!

Absolutely love this laptop! The performance for content creation and gaming is incredible, especially the NVIDIA GTX 1050. Boots up super fast and handles everything I throw at it. The port selection is also top-notch. Highly recommend for anyone looking for a beast like the HP Pavilion 15-cx0056wm 15.6" IPS Intel Core i5 8th Gen 8300H (2.30 GHz) NVIDIA GeForce GTX 1050 Ti 8 GB Memory 1 TB HDD Windows 10 Home 64-bit Gaming Laptop!

Fantastic gaming laptop for the price. Getting amazing FPS in Fortnite and Call of Duty: Warzone. The build quality of the HP Pavilion 15-cx0056wm 15.6" IPS Intel Core i5 8th Gen 8300H (2.30 GHz) NVIDIA GeForce GTX 1050 Ti 8 GB Memory 1 TB HDD Windows 10 Home 64-bit Gaming Laptop is solid, and the screen brightness is a joy to use. A definite 5 stars!

Exceeded my expectations! Perfect for content creation and gaming. The NVIDIA GTX 1050 in the HP Pavilion 15-cx0056wm 15.6" IPS Intel Core i5 8th Gen 8300H (2.30 GHz) NVIDIA GeForce GTX 1050 Ti 8 GB Memory 1 TB HDD Windows 10 Home 64-bit Gaming Laptop is a powerhouse. Battery life is decent for a gaming laptop too. Very satisfied with this purchase.

Fantastic gaming laptop for the price. Getting amazing FPS in Valorant and Apex Legends. The build quality of the HP Pavilion 15-cx0056wm 15.6" IPS Intel Core i5 8th Gen 8300H (2.30 GHz) NVIDIA GeForce GTX 1050 Ti 8 GB Memory 1 TB HDD Windows 10 Home 64-bit Gaming Laptop is solid, and the port selection is a joy to use. A definite 5 stars!
